overview.en: BeautyBloc builds a credit system BVS (Beauty Value Score) with blockchain technology, Revolutionary token transfer mode，Incentive mechanism and Decentralized trading platform , To reduce the cost and improve the efficiency of medical beauty industry.
overview.zh: BeautyBloc利用区块链技术，革命性令牌转移模式，激励机制和分散交易平台建立信用体系BVS（美丽价值评分），以降低成本，提高医疗美容行业的效率。
